name: ethereal-icons
description: Ethereal Icons is a React icon library that provides a collection of customizable and scalable SVG icons for modern web applications.

scripts.ship-git: npm run generate-icons &&git add . && git commit -m 'Build' && git push origin main && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.ship: npm run generate-icons && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
